name: Healthyfied Radish Ensalada
description: This Healthyfied Radish Ensalada is perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet. Made with fresh tomatoes, red onion, peppery radish, and a savory touch from dried fish, it's a delicious way to enjoy a healthier side dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by thinly slicing the tomatoes and red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the daikon radish and slice it thinly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a dry pan over medium heat, lightly toast the dried fish until fragrant and slightly crumbly, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the sliced tomatoes, red onion, and daikon radish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble the toasted dried fish over the salad.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Season with ground pepper and toss everything together until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
